titles.title: Displaced-by-Airport Noise Homeowner Equity Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the moving expense deduction for moving expenses associated with the sale of a residence eligible to receive benefits under an approved airport noise compatibility program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/11/1993--Introduced. Displaced-by-Airport Noise Homeowner Equity Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to apply the moving expense deduction to moves from residences eligible for benefits under a noise compatibility program.
